name: Automated Email Classification & Response System with Groq AI and Pinecone
description:
üìù Description
This workflow helps automatically classify incoming emails using a combination of conditional logic and minimal AI-based classification. The system checks email content, performs sentiment analysis, uses OpenAI for categorization, and routes emails accordingly ‚Äî with smart but efficient use of LLMs and AI Agents.

‚öôÔ∏è How it works
Trigger: An IMAP Email Trigger initiates the workflow upon receiving a new email.

Code Block: Parses essential data from the email.

Switch Node: Routes emails based on classification.

LLM Chain: Processes specific email cases (e.g., inquiries or complaints).

AI Agent (Minimal): Used only when other methods cannot determine intent.

Email Responses: Sends tailored replies or routes to support/sales teams accordingly.

Sentiment Analysis: Assists with tone evaluation for better response routing.

üß© Set up steps
Estimated setup time: 10‚Äì15 minutes

You‚Äôll need:

An IMAP-compatible email account

OpenAI or any compatible LLM provider

Pinecone (optional, for vector memory)

SMTP credentials for sending email

Replace placeholder credentials in sticky notes before running.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

parameters.text:
=You are an HR assistant.

Here is the job description for the role:

[Insert role details here, e.g., "Looking for a Python Developer with experience in Django, REST APIs, and SQL."]

Now, read the following candidate's email/resume and evaluate if they are a good fit for this role.

If suitable, respond with:
ACCEPT - and a brief explanation why.

If not suitable, respond with:
REJECT - and a brief explanation why.

Candidate's email/resume:
{{ $json["emailText"] }}

=
A new complaint has been received from {{ $json["userName"] || "a customer" }}:

"{{ $json["complaintText"] }}"

Please investigate and resolve this
parameters.subject: New Customer Complaint Received

parameters.text:
=We Received Your Complaint

Thank you for reaching out to us. We have received your complaint:

"{{ $json["complaintText"] }}"

Our team is currently reviewing it and will get back to you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

From , 
Customer Support Team
parameters.subject: Complaint Received

parameters.text:
=Dear Candidate,

Thank you for applying. After review, we regret to inform you that you do not fit the requirements at this time.

Details: {{$json["aiResponse"]}}

Best regards,
HR Team
parameters.subject: Job Application Status: Not selected

parameters.text:
=Hello HR Team,

Candidate {{$json["candidate"]}} has been accepted with a score of {{$json["score"]}}.

Please proceed with the next steps.
parameters.subject: =New Candidate Accepted:

parameters.text:
=Dear Candidate,

Congratulations! You have been accepted for the role.

Details: {{$json["aiResponse"]}}

Best regards,
HR Team
parameters.subject: Job Application Status: Accepted
NEW BILL

parameters.content: USE FOR AI AGENT WHEN SWITCH FAILS

parameters.subject: sales

parameters.text:
=You are a helpful assistant replying to a customer inquiry via email.

Use the following information retrieved from our documents to generate a clear, professional response.

Context:
{{ $json["vectors"].map(v => v.metadata.text).join("\n\n") || "No context available." }}

Customer's Question:
{{ $json["emailText"] }}

Respond with a structured and informative email. Summarize any important points about products, services, or team details. Keep the tone polite and helpful.

parameters.content: check if feedback is postive or nrgative
details of business in pdf form to vector db
